text:
Domestic Violence Orders (National Recognition) Regulations 2017

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Domestic Violence Orders (National Recognition) Act 2016 .

30 October 2017

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Justice

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Domestic Violence Orders (National Recognition) Regulations 2017 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on the day on which the Domestic Violence Orders (National Recognition) Act 2016 commences.

3. Principal Act
    In these regulations, the Domestic Violence Orders (National Recognition) Act 2016 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendments effected by this regulation have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Domestic Violence Orders (National Recognition) Act 2016 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this regulation have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Domestic Violence Orders (National Recognition) Act 2016 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 8 November 2017
